TopicTitle: Folder System in VAB/SPH for .Craft files

Articles.Content:
As title says. We have this for all of our parts but not the many many many ships we're going to be designing? I don't think this is difficult for the developers to do, but I think it's nigh impossible to mod because of the lack of access to the .craft retrieving system built into the game.

Devs could do this in a day and bughunt it in two days (I doubt there'd be many bugs to hunt).

I'ts not a big ask, and would bring alot to sandbox and career players alike.

While you're at it sub-assemblies could have a folder system too!

I was among the first to suggest this ~2 years ago and it's been suggested countless times before, there's no reason not to add this.
